title: Lead, Executive & Internal Communications, Apple Services Engineering
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) team is one of the most exciting examples of Apple’s long-held passion for combining art and technology. These are the people who power the App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, Apple Books, and iCloud, among other services.
description: In this role you’ll work directly with executives and cross-functional partners to develop content that informs, engages, and inspires Apple Services Engineering (ASE) employees. You will provide writing support to senior executives for a global engineering audience, with a specific focus on the Cloud Systems & Platforms (CSP) team within ASE.
preferred_qualifications: Accustomed to purposing content for a range of channels and platforms. Proven success developing executive-level messaging for senior management teams.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. The base pay range for this role is between $133,900 and $201,300, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
